Sentencas: Initialization is a critical processing step that has thus far limited the application of the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC).
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: In-situ initialization of a SC-SOFC with a nickel-based anode by methane-air mixtures was investigated.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: Porous Ru-CeO2 was used as a catalyst layer over a Ni-ScSZ cermet anode.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: Catalytic testing demonstrated Ru-CeO2 had high activity for methane oxidation.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: The Ru in the catalyst layer catalyzed the formation of syngas, which successfully reduced the nickel oxide to metallic nickel in the anode.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: Single cells with a La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) cathode, initialized by this in-situ reduction method, delivered peak power densities of 205 and 327 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and 850 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process

Sentencas: Such performances were better than those of the cell without the Ru-CeO2 catalyst layer that was initialized by an ex-situ reduction method were.
Titulo: Activation of a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell by a simple catalyst-assisted in-situ process
